• MQTT-powered multiplayer mining game with procedural terrain generation.
  • Includes resource collection, equipment upgrades, trading systems, and player statistics.
  • Features admin controls, chat functionality, customizable keybinds, and local save management.
    const Game = new GameEngine();
    if (this.localPlayer.cargo < this.localPlayer.maxCargo) {

Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining simulation using MQTT networking for real-time player interaction. Players excavate procedurally generated terrain to collect resources for upgrades while809managing fuel consumption and environmental hazards. The interface includes inventory management, shop transactions, player stats tracking, and customizable server connections.
